operations.description: Paginated list of controls with optional filters (framework, status, owner, category)
Retrieve a single control by ID, including test results, evidence links, and framework mappings
Define a new control with title, description, category, owner, and framework mapping
Update the operational status of a control (passing, failing, needs review, not applicable)
Paginated list of risks with optional filters (category, rating, owner, treatment status)
Retrieve a single risk by ID, including assessments, linked controls, and treatment plan
Register a new risk with description, category, inherent rating, and risk owner
Record a risk assessment with likelihood, impact, residual rating, and review date
Paginated list of policies with optional filters (status, category, approver)
Retrieve a single policy by ID, including version history and acknowledgement status
Create a new policy document with title, content, category, and approval workflow
Publish a draft policy, making it active and triggering acknowledgement requests
Paginated list of audit engagements with optional filters (status, type, date range)
Retrieve a single audit by ID, including scope, findings, and workpapers
Create a new audit engagement with scope, auditor assignments, and timeline
Paginated list of findings with optional filters (severity, status, audit, control)
Record a new finding with description, severity, affected control, and remediation plan
List pending evidence requests with associated controls and due dates
Upload evidence (document, screenshot, log export) against a specific control or finding
List all compliance frameworks configured in the platform (SOC 2, ISO 27001, GDPR, etc.)
Retrieve a single framework with its requirements, control mappings, and completion status
Create or update a mapping between a control and one or more framework requirements
List third-party/vendor risk assessments with status and risk ratings
